original: 10 Indriyayamaka
analyzed: indriya yamaka

original: 10.3 Pariññāvāra
analyzed: pariññāvāra

original: 10.3.4. Paccuppannātītavāra
10.3.4.1. Anuloma
analyzed: anuloma

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānāti saḥ domanassindriyam pajahittha ati āmantā

original: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana domanassa indriyam pajahittha so cakkhu indriyam parijānāti iti

original: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ parijānanti. Aggamaggasamaṅgī domanassindriyañca pajahittha cakkhundriyañca parijānāti.
analyzed: dve puggalā domanassindriyam pajahittha no ca cakkhundriyam parijānanti aggamagga samaṅgī domanassindriyam ca pajahittha cakkhundriyam ca parijānāti

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānāti saḥ anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam bhāvittha ati āmantā

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam bhāvittha so cakkhu indriyam parijānāti iti

original: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ parijānanti. Aggamaggasamaṅgī anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha cakkhundriyañca parijānāti.
analyzed: cha puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam bhāvittha no ca cakkhundriyam parijānanti aggamagga samaṅgī anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam ca bhāvittha cakkhundriyam ca parijānāti

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānāti so aññindriyam bhāvittha ati no

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam bhāvittha so cakkhu indriyam parijānāti iti no

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānāti saḥ aññātāvindriyam sacchikarittha ati no

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti? No. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam sacchikarittha saḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānāti iti no cakkhu indriya mūlaka

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ domanassa indriyam pajahati saḥ anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam bhāvittha ati āmantā

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam bhāvittha saḥ domanassindriyam pajahati iti

original: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha, no ca domanassindriyaṁ pajahanti. Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha domanassindriyañca pajahati.
analyzed: cha puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam bhāvittha no ca domanassindriyam pajahanti anāgāmi magga samaṅgī anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam ca bhāvittha domanassindriyam ca pajahati

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ domanassindriyam pajahati saḥ aññindriyam bhāvittha ati no

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam bhāvittha saḥ domanassindriyam pajahati iti no

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ domanassa indriyam pajahati saḥ aññātāvindriyam sacchikarittha ati no

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti? No. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātau indriyam sacchikarittha saḥ domanassa indriyam pajahati iti no domanassa indriya mūlaka

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam bhāveti saḥ aññindriyam bhāvittha ati no

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvetīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam bhāvittha saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam bhāveti iti no

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ an aññāta ñassāmi iti indriyam bhāveti saḥ aññātau indriyam sacchikarittha ati no

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvetīti? No. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātau indriyam sacchikarittha saḥ an aññātaññassāmi iti indriyam bhāveti iti no an aññātaññassāmi iti indriya mūlaka

original: Yo aññindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ aññindriyam bhāveti saḥ aññātāvindriyam sacchikarittha ati no

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvetīti? No. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam sacchikarittha saḥ aññindriyam bhāveti iti no aññindriya mūlaka

original: 10.3.4.2. Paccanīka
analyzed: paccanīka

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti saḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahittha ati

original: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha. Cha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
analyzed: dve puggalā cakkhu indriyam na parijānanti no ca domanassindriyam na pajahittha cha puggalā cakkhu indriyam ca na parijānanti domanassindriyam ca na pajahittha

original: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana domanassindriyam na pajahittha saḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti iti āmantā

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvittha ati

original: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
analyzed: cha puggalā cakkhu indriyam na parijānanti no ca anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam na bhāvittha dve puggalā cakkhu indriyam ca na parijānanti anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam ca na bhāvittha

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvittha saḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti iti āmantā

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti saḥ aññindriyam na bhāvittha ati

original: Arahā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Satta puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
analyzed: arahā cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti no ca aññindriyam na bhāvittha satta puggalā cakkhu indriyam ca na parijānanti aññindriyam ca na bhāvittha

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam na bhāvittha so cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti iti

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti. Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
analyzed: aggamagga samaṅgī aññindriyam na bhāvittha no ca cakkhundriyam na parijānāti satta puggalāḥ aññindriyam ca na bhāvittha cakkhundriyam ca na parijānanti

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti saḥ aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha ati

original: Arahā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha. Aṭṭha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
analyzed: arahā cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti no ca aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha aṭṭha puggalā cakkhu indriyam ca na parijānanti aññātāvindriyam ca na sacchikarittha

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha so cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti iti

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti.
analyzed: aggamagga samaṅgī aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha no ca cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti

original: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
analyzed: aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha cakkhu indriyañca na parijānanti

original: (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: cakkhu indriya mūlaka

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ domanassa indriyam na ppajahati saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvittha ati

original: Cha puggalā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
analyzed: cha puggalā domanassa indriyam na ppajahanti no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvittha dve puggalā domanassa indriyam ca na ppajahanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyam ca na bhāvittha

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvittha saḥ domanassindriyam na pajahati iti āmantā

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ domanassa indriyam na pajahati saḥ aññindriyam na bhāvittha ati

original: Arahā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Satta puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
analyzed: arahā domanassindriyam na ppajahati no ca aññindriyam na bhāvittha satta puggalā domanassindriyam ca na ppajahanti aññindriyam ca na bhāvittha

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam na bhāvittha saḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahati iti

original: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha, no ca domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati. Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.
analyzed: anāgāmi magga samaṅgī aññindriyam na bhāvittha no ca domanassindriyam na ppajahati satta puggalā aññindriyam ca na bhāvittha domanassindriyam ca na ppajahanti

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahati saḥ aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha ati

original: Arahā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha. Aṭṭha puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
analyzed: arahā domanassindriyam na ppajahati no ca aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha aṭṭha puggalā domanassindriyam ca na ppajahanti aññātāvindriyam ca na sacchikarittha

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha saḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahati iti

original: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha, no ca domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati.
analyzed: anāgāmi magga samaṅgī aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha no ca domanassindriyam na ppajahati

original: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.
analyzed: aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha domanassindriyañca na ppajahanti

original: (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: domanassindriya mūlaka

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāveti saḥ aññindriyam na bhāvittha ati

original: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
analyzed: arahā anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam na bhāveti no ca aññindriyam na bhāvittha satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam ca na bhāventi aññindriyam ca na bhāvittha

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam na bhāvittha saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāveti iti

original: Aṭṭhamako aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti. Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi.
analyzed: aṭṭhamakaḥ aññindriyam na bhāvittha no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāveti satta puggalāḥ aññindriyam ca na bhāvittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyam ca na bhāventi

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ an aññāta ñassāmi iti indriyam na bhāveti saḥ aññātau indriyam na sacchikarittha ati

original: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha. Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
analyzed: arahā anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam na bhāveti no ca aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha aṭṭha puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam ca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyam ca na sacchikarittha

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātau indriyam na sacchikarittha saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāveti iti

original: Aṭṭhamako aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti.
analyzed: aṭṭhamakaḥ aññātau indriyam na sacchikarittha no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāveti

original: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na
analyzed: aṭṭha puggalāḥ aññātau indriyañca na sacchikarittha an aññāta ñassāmi itindriyañca na

original: bhāventi. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: bhāventi

original: Yo aññindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ aññindriyam na bhāveti saḥ aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha ati

original: Arahā aññindriyaṁ na bhāveti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha. Cha puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
analyzed: arahā aññindriyam na bhāveti no ca aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha cha puggalāḥ aññindriyam ca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyam ca na sacchikarittha

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha saḥ aññindriyam na bhāveti iti

original: Tayo maggasamaṅgino aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāventi.
analyzed: tayo magga samaṅgino aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarittha no ca aññindriyam na bhāventi

original: Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha aññindriyañca na bhāventi. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha aññindriyañca na bhāventi aññindriya mūlaka
